content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=107.5, y=-33.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position x=62.0, y=-54.0) 

### Transport belt system
Consists of following entities
- Belt (position x=63.5, y=-52.5) 
- Belt (position x=64.5, y=-52.5)

### Water pipe system
Consists of following entities
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=6070, fluid=water position=x=107.5 y=-34.5)
- OffshorePump (position x=107.5, y=-33.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)

### Steam pipe system
Consists of following entities
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=6074, position=x=117.5 y=-34.5)
- Generator (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using insert_item but being out of resources
- Make sure to check the current inventory before attempting to insert items.
- Ensure that the required resources are available in the inventory.

### Errors when using insert_item but having no fuel
- Make sure to check the current fuel status of the entity before attempting to insert fuel.
- Ensure that the required fuel is available in the inventory.

### Errors when placing entities but having no space
- Not observed in the given logs.

### Errors when using offshore pump but having no water
- Not observed in the given logs.

# NAMESPACE
### Utility Functions
- `insert_item`: Inserts an item into an entity.
- `harvest`: Harvests resources from the environment.
- `add_to_boiler`: Adds fuel to a boiler.

### Important Variables
- `transport-belt`: A type of item used for transportation.
- `small-electric-pole`: A type of item used for electricity transmission.
- `wood`: A type of resource.
- `iron-ore`: A type of resource.
- `copper-ore`: A type of resource.
- `iron-plate`: A type of item crafted from iron-ore.
- `copper-plate`: A type of item crafted from copper-ore.
- `copper-cable`: A type of item crafted from copper-plate.
- `iron-gear-wheel`: A type of item crafted from iron-plate.
